subsection.title: Create new template by importing
subsection.note: Only Mingle administrators can create new templates.
subsection.p: You can create a new template by importing previously exported Mingle templates.

item.p: Click on the 'Import template' link from manage templates page. This will take you to the 'Import template' page. Select the exported Mingle template and give it a name and a identifier.
item.hint: If you do not provide a name and an identifier, the imported template's name and its identifier will be provided automatically.

item.p: Click on the 'Import template' link to start importing the selected template.
item.note: All project settings, cards and pages will be kept except team members, who are not present templates.

item.p: After importing the template successfully you can find the newly imported template on the 'Manage templates' page.
